articles.title: S. Korea Accused of Charging Progressives with "Following North"
articles.content:
S. Korea Accused of Charging Progressives with "Following North"
 Pyongyang, March 15 (KCNA) -- The Secretariat of the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea issued the following information bulletin No. 1023 on Friday:
					 South Korean organizations and people are becoming increasingly assertive in rejecting the "resolution" adopted at the UN against the DPRK and the U.S.-south Korea war exercises aimed at invading it while demanding an immediate halt to them.
					
					 They included the Solidarity for Progress, the Federation of University Students in the 21st Century and other progressive civic and public organizations and people from different social standings including personages of opposition parties and academic and religious worlds.
					
					 They say sanctions can not help solve the situation and the ongoing joint military exercises are offensive ones aimed at bringing down the government of the north, strongly urging the U.S. and the south Korean regime to withdraw the sanctions, stop the moves for confrontation and war and opt for dialogue and conclusion of a peace treaty.
					
					 They warned that if the U.S. continues the war exercises far from opting for conclusion of a peace treaty, they will launch an anti-U.S. campaign with the peace movement organizations.
					
					 It is a just act as it reflects the mindset of south Korean people who, as members of the Korean nation, turned out in a campaign to prevent a war on the Korean Peninsula, no longer remaining an onlooker to the present situation that edges toward the lowest point. It also carries all other Koreans' desire for detente and peace of the peninsula.
					
					 However, the "Saenuri Party" regime and conservative media in south Korea have charged them with "patronizing the north" and "openly disclosing their nature as north followers".
					
					 The regime's labeling of the progressive people who protested the "sanctions" and war moves as "north followers" is another unacceptable traitorous crime and a provocation against the north.
					
					 The regime's desperate moves are intended to divert elsewhere the public attention focused on it, justify its confrontation and war moves and exploit this opportunity for stamping out the forces struggling to reunify the country through the alliance with the north and organizations of the anti-war peace movement.
					
					 Infuriated at this, the progressive organizations and people from all walks of life in south Korea are denouncing the regime's moves, saying that the demand for peace against a war represents the north's stand, while the demand for a war seems to represent the U.S. stand.
					
					 The regime again comes out with the already worn-out "theory of following the north", indicative of its predicament in the face of the condemnation at home and abroad.
					
					 This only reveals its true colors as the most "loyal" war servant for the U.S. imperialists and a group of traitors sycophantic to the U.S.
					
					 The conservative regime would be well advised to face up to the gravity of the present situation and the public sentiment and stop the reckless war exercises and the racket of labeling progressive organizations and people as "north followers".
					
					 If the regime keeps on seeking provocations for a north-targeted nuclear war in league with the U.S. imperialists, it will face stronger denunciation at home and abroad and meet the most shameful destruction.
					
					 South Koreans from different social standings should turn out in a vigorous struggle for rejecting the regime's frantic moves for confrontation with fellow countrymen and war maneuvers.

articles.title: Actions for Punishing Lee Myung Bak Mount: Lawyers Association
articles.content:
Actions for Punishing Lee Myung Bak Mount: Lawyers Association
 Pyongyang, March 15 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Democratic Lawyers Association of Korea issued the following statement Friday:
					 There is widespread struggle in south Korea to bring traitor Lee Myung Bak to justice for his hideous crimes during his office.
					
					 The YTN Trade Union some days ago took the case of Lee to prosecution, charging him with the illegal surveillance of civilians.  The Citizens Solidarity for Democratic Society and Human Rights indicted Lee and his family for the suspicious purchase of housing lot in Naegok-dong.
					
					 The mounting campaign calling for punishing Lee for a gamut of irregularities and crimes soon after the end of his office is an eruption of the pent-up grudge and wrath of south Koreans and a righteous struggle for setting right social justice.
					
					 To look back, Lee was engrossed in injustice and evil acts during his office.
					
					 Many were shocked by the disclosure of a series of unprecedented cases of corruption and irregularities and swindling committed by Lee and his families, relatives and close confidants ranging from the case of BBK stock price manipulation, case of illegal "electioneering fund", the savings bank case, the case of CNK stock price manipulation, the case of illegal surveillance of civilians and the case of purchasing housing lot in Naegok-dong.
					
					 South Korea turned into corrupt society, a living hell because of the despicable crimes committed by Lee, who earned an ill fame as "a die-hard swindler", "an incarnation of shamelessness and brazenness" and "president full of irregularities" and by his families and relatives.
					
					 So many are crimes the traitor committed against the nation through confrontation with fellow countrymen and war moves.
					
					 The traitor harmed the dignity and interests of the nation through the pursuit of sycophantic treachery and plunged the north-south ties into a deadlock, creating a serious stumbling block in the way of peace and reunification.
					
					 No wonder, he is branded as a matchless sycophant and traitor and a die-hard confrontation and war maniac who puts the "five traitors of 1905" into the shade. 
					
					 Top class criminal Lee is now unable to escape a stern punishment by the angry people of all social standings in south Korea and all other fellow countrymen.
					
					 As the successive pro-U.S. lackeys did, Lee will meet the most miserable end, cursed by the south Koreans and all other Koreans.
					
					 It is as clear as daylight that Lee will be thrown into behind bars as was the case with Chun Doo Hwan and Roh Thae Woo as soon as they were ousted. 
					
					 There is no application of the statute of limitation to the high treason the traitor committed before history and the nation by perpetrating evils against the people, reunification and humanity. 
					
					 People from all walks of life in south Korea will give vent to the grudge and resentment pent up during five years' nightmare and thus surely bring Lee, kingpin of all sorts of illegal acts and crimes, and his clan to the court and mete out a stern punishment to them.

articles.title: People Gather in DPRK to Back Statement of KPA Supreme Command
articles.content:
People Gather in DPRK to Back Statement of KPA Supreme Command
 Pyongyang, March 15 (KCNA) -- In different parts of the DPRK servicepersons and civilians gathered to support the statement of a spokesman for the Supreme Command of the Korean People's Army (KPA).
					 The areas include Huichon and Songrim cities and Pukchong, Rakwon, Jonchon, Hwangju and Taehongdan counties.
					
					 Present at the meetings were officers and men of the KPA, officials of local party and power organs and working people's organizations, officials and other people of industrial establishments and co-op farms and teachers and students of universities and colleges.
					
					 Referring to the news of the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un's inspections of frontline areas, including the biggest hotspots, by setting up a supreme command on the forefront, speakers at the meetings said that the news instilled confidence in sure victory into the service members and civilians who are all out in confrontation with the U.S.
					
					 They called for holding in high esteem the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il for all ages and devotedly defending the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea headed by Kim Jong Un.
					
					 They also expressed the determination to turn their localities into impregnable fortresses and mercilessly repulse the aggressors with the might of the great army-people unity in decisive final battles.
					
					 They expressed the will not to miss the golden chance to wipe out the aggressors at one go by the Paektusan-style counteraction and accomplish the historic cause of national reunification without fail when they provoke the DPRK.
					
					 They also appealed to all of them to win a final victory in the all-out action against the U.S. imperialists under the leadership of the great party and fully demonstrate the dignity and sovereignty of the great Paektusan nation.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Inspection of Frontline Unit Emboldens DPRK People
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Inspection of Frontline Unit Emboldens DPRK People
 Pyongyang, March 15 (KCNA) -- Marshal Kim Jong Un, supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, inspected the Wolnae Islet Defence Detachment, an outpost in the biggest hotspot in the western sector of the front, recently when the U.S.-south Korea nuclear war exercises were going on at their height.
					 His inspection has hardened the will of the DPRK people to mercilessly punish the enemies.
					
					 Choe Yong Dok, manager of the North Phyongan Provincial Tideland Reclamation Complex, told KCNA:
					
					 "I was deeply moved to hear the news about Marshal Kim Jong Un's inspection tour of the Wolnae Islet Defence Detachment located at a stone's throw from Paekryong Island where the south Korean armed forces are stationed.
					
					 The tour was four days after his inspection of the defence detachments in Jangjae and Mu islets located in the southernmost part of the southwestern front. It gives a glimpse of his courage and iron will."
					
					 Jo Chol Ju, manager of the Songdowon Unha Garment Factory, said:
					
					 "Marshal Kim Jong Un gave field guidance to the Ryongjong Fish Farm when the situation was reaching an extreme pitch. The field guidance foretells DPRK's victory in the showdown with the U.S.
					
					 Employees of my factory are now making a fresh production upsurge in the spirit of annihilating the provokers."
					
					 Ri Kang Uk, a war veteran living in Central District, Pyongyang said:
					
					 "The picture of Marshal Kim Jong Un surveying Paekryong Island with binocular inspires the people with conviction of victory.
					
					 The DPRK is able to defeat any formidable enemy since it is led by Kim Jong Un, identical to Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il in pluck and courage."

articles.title: DPRK People Touched by Kim Jong Un's Military Inspection
articles.content:
DPRK People Touched by Kim Jong Un's Military Inspection
 Pyongyang, March 15 (KCNA) -- The news about respected Marshal Kim Jong Un's continued inspection of islet defence detachments in the biggest hotspot in the western sector of the front deeply touched the servicepersons and civilians of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea all out in the showdown with the U.S.
					 His tours were timed with the situation growing tense due to the joint anti-DPRK military exercises of the U.S. imperialists and its allied forces.
					
					 They made the local people more keenly feel that Kim Jong Un represents the DPRK's strength as well as the banner of victory in a sacred war for national reunification.
					
					 Thereby, when he visited the Wolnae Islet Defence Detachment on March 11, all servicepersons sang in chorus with tears in their eyes "Ardent Wishes", a song based on the people's wish for his good health and safety.
					
					 As the song says, the Korean people think that the destiny and future of the nation are entirely dependent on Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Inspection Inspires People with Confidence in Victory
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Inspection Inspires People with Confidence in Victory
 Pyongyang, March 15 (KCNA) -- Respected Marshal Kim Jong Un gave field guidance to the Ryongjong Fish Farm in the wake of his inspection of the Wolnae Islet Defence Detachment, an outpost in the biggest hotspot in the western sector of the front, on Monday.
					 The field guidance has given the DPRK army and people confidence in sure victory in the ongoing showdown with the U.S. imperialists as it was made when a touch-and-go situation was prevailing on the Korean Peninsula due to the madcap war military exercises of the U.S. imperialists and their followers.
					
					 This shocking news reminds the Korean people of the last Fatherland Liberation War.
					
					 During the hard-fought war President Kim Il Sung contemplated reconstructing the war-torn country with firm belief in victory in the war.
					
					 In the wartime, he took measures to map out a blueprint for the postwar reconstruction of Pyongyang, found an academy of sciences, enforce a free medical system, establish a factory college and recall students and teachers to universities from the war front.
					
					 This steadfast courage and faith of Kim Il Sung led the Korean people to win in the war by shattering to smithereens the myth of the U.S. imperialists' "mightiness".
					
					 Marshal Kim Jong Un is now guiding the present all-out action of the Korean people to victory with the same faith, will and pluck as shown by President Kim Il Sung in the last war.
					
					 Pang Song Chol, a 45-year-old Pyongyang citizen, told KCNA:
					
					 "It was very surprised to hear the news that respected Marshal Kim Jong Un toured a fish farm though he was busy with ceaseless inspection of frontline military units to cope with the enemies' frantic provocations.
					
					 I feel grateful to him caring so much for the wellbeing of the people even under the grave situation.
					
					 I am confident of the DPRK's victory in the face-off with the U.S."

articles.title: Light Industrial Workers Enjoy Unhasu Concert
articles.content:
Light Industrial Workers Enjoy Unhasu Concert 
 Pyongyang, March 15 (KCNA) -- The Unhasu concert was given for participants in a national meeting of light industrial workers at the People's Theatre on Friday. The concert was prepared to mark the International Women's Day.
					 Put on the stage were colorful numbers including orchestral music and mixed chorus "Women Are Flowers", female solo and female pangchang "Love of Great Mother", a serial song "Blessings to You" and "My Wife" and female chorus "Song of Coastal Artillery Women." 
					
					 The performers sang high praises of the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, who lived all their lives, guided by the maxim of believing in the people as in Heaven, and built a socialist paradise on this land by pursuing politics of love for them

articles.title: Scientific, Technological Festival of Kim Il Sung University Held
articles.content:
Scientific, Technological Festival of Kim Il Sung University Held
 Pyongyang, March 15 (KCNA) -- The 28th Scientific and Technological Festival of Kim Il Sung University was held from Tuesday to Friday.
					 Taking part in the festival were teachers, researchers and postgraduate students of Kim Il Sung University. It took place in the forms of presentation of scientific and technological achievements, display contest and exchange of intellectual goods and new technologies.
					
					 The Mathematics Faculty of the university came first in the presentation of scientific and technological achievements as it displayed cutting-edge research achievements made in modern mathematics education.
					
					 Also winning the first place were papers presented by Kim Ryong Hung, a department head of the Geology Faculty, Kim Ok Sun, teacher of the Chemistry Faculty, Yu Jin Hui, teacher of the Electronics and Automation Faculty, Kim Sun Dol, a section chief of Computer Science College, Hong Son Sam, teacher of Pyongyang Agricultural College, and Pak Yong Ju, a section chief of Pyongyang Medical College.
					
					 The Electronics and Automation Faculty of the university placed first at the display contest.

articles.title: Endless Crowd of Youth Participate in 1000-ri Journey for Learning
articles.content:
Endless Crowd of Youth Participate in 1000-ri Journey for Learning
 Pyongyang, March 15 (KCNA) -- Nine decades have passed since Generalissimo Kim Il Sung made a 1,000-ri long journey for learning. 
					 The "1,000-ri Journey for Learning" of school youth and children started in March Juche 63 (1974). Since then more than 500,000 school youth and children have taken part in the journey. 
					
					 Generalissimo Kim Jong Il initiated the 1,000-ri journey for learning while giving field guidance to Ryanggang Province in July 1968. 
					
					 A decision on making the 1,000-ri journey of the revolution for learning from the glorious childhood and youth of Kim Il Sung was adopted at the meeting of the Political Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea Central Committee held in October 1973. In March next year a group of at least 5,000 exemplary school youth and children across the country made the first journey. 
					
					 Kim Jong Il saw to it that the journey was made an annual event. 
					
					 During the journey the participants trained their bodies and minds, displaying a strong sense of organization and discipline and collectivism, and held colorful political and cultural events including poem recitations and oath-taking meetings.

articles.title: US Branded as Mastermind of Crisis in Korean Peninsula
articles.content:
US Branded as Mastermind of Crisis in Korean Peninsula
 Pyongyang, March 15 (KCNA) -- A serious crisis in which a nuclear war may break out is now prevailing in the Korean Peninsula due to the U.S.-sponsored collective "sanctions" and military maneuvers against the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 The United States prodded the UN Security Council into cooking up anti-DPRK resolutions over its peaceful satellite launch and self-defensive nuclear test and launched war exercises with huge armed forces involved.
					
					 In fact, the Korean Peninsula has been under the persistent tense situation and the blame for it is entirely on the U.S.
					
					 Over the past years, the U.S. has steadily reinforced its troops in south Korea with introduction of aircraft, tanks, warships, missiles and other weaponry in violation of the Korean Armistice Agreement, which bans any shipment of war means into south Korea and any action of posing military threat to the DPRK. In particular, it turned south Korea into the biggest nuclear outpost in the Far East.
					
					 As a matter of fact, it has attempted use of nukes against the DPRK several times from the period of the last Korean War (1950-1953) and deployed more than 1,000 nuclear weapons in south Korea.
					
					 In its 2002 "nuclear posture review" the U.S. singled out the DPRK as one of the targets of its preemptive nuclear attack and even specified that it would use nukes against the DPRK any time for its own strategic interests.
					
					 It also justified its policy of aggression on the DPRK, making much fuss about "threat" from it.
					
					 After the Korean War, the U.S. imperialists have committed ceaseless anti-DPRK military provocations on the Korean Peninsula. The Team Spirit joint military exercises, staged by them with the south Korean forces, were a preliminary war or a test nuclear war aimed at attacking the DPRK from sky, land and sea with huge armed forces mobilized from south Korea, Japan and other regions around the Korean Peninsula and from the U.S. mainland.
					
					 In the new century, too, the U.S. warmongers, together with the south Korean puppet forces, have staged Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises, straining the situation on the Korean Peninsula on purpose. The DPRK-targeted exercises are for rapidly introducing allied forces into the peninsula in the event of "contingency".
					
					 The U.S. imperialists describe them as "annual" and "defensive" in a bid to cover up their aggressive nature and purpose.
					
					 The recent UNSC "resolutions on sanctions" against the DPRK contain the U.S. scheme to openly invade the DPRK under the name of the United Nations.
					
					 As seen above, the current crisis on the Korean Peninsula is a result of the U.S. persistent hostile policy towards the DPRK. Nevertheless, the U.S. puts the military pressure upon the DPRK, branding it as a "criminal".
					
					 It is the DPRK's independent mode of counteraction to counter enemies coming in attack with a rifle with an artillery piece and with nukes with more powerful nuclear deterrent.
					
					 The DPRK servicepersons and civilians are now keeping themselves on a high alert with will to repel any aggression moves of the U.S. imperialists and mercilessly wipe out all the aggressors.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls on People to Turn Out in All-out Action against US
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls on People to Turn Out in All-out Action against US
 Pyongyang, March 15 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Friday carries an editorial calling upon all service personnel and people to turn out in an all-out action against the U.S.
					 "Everything for the final victory in the all-out action against the U.S." -- this is a militant banner to be upheld by all service personnel and people of the DPRK, the editorial says, and goes on:
					
					 The U.S. and south Korean puppet regime's frantic nuclear war maneuvers for invading the DPRK are being staged on a full-dress stage, and the U.S. is attempting to disarm the DPRK by abusing the name of the UN.
					
					 Under the prevailing situation the DPRK totally nullified the Korean Armistice Agreement (AA), which had been maintained though perfunctorily, and the north-south agreements on nonaggression as it declared before.
					
					 The nullification of the AA offered the revolutionary armed forces of the DPRK a golden opportunity to settle accounts with the U.S. imperialist aggressor troops, the sworn enemies of the Korean people, with merciless arms of justice and achieve the great cause of national reunification, the cherished desire of the nation.
					
					 The dear respected Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un visited the Wolnae Islet Defence Detachment in the wake of the Jangjae Islet Defence Detachment and the Mu Islet Hero Defence Detachment located in the biggest hotspot. There he said if an order is issued, service personnel should break the waists of the crazy enemies, totally cut off their windpipes and clearly show them what a real war is like.
					
					 The service personnel and people of the DPRK are fully determined to mercilessly wipe out the aggressors to the last man at a dueling battle with them and enter the square of military parade with fireworks displayed to celebrate a victory in war.
					
					 The all-out action against the U.S. which the party and people started with determination will continue to the end, and the service personnel and people of the DPRK will certainly achieve the historic cause of national reunification.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Terms UNSC "Resolution" Product of Hostile Policy
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Terms UNSC "Resolution" Product of Hostile Policy
 Pyongyang, March 15 (KCNA) -- The illegal and brigandish "resolutions on sanctions" against the DPRK adopted  at the UN Security Council is a product of the U.S. and its allies' extremely hostile policy towards the DPRK aimed to disarm and stifle  it and thus bring down its ideology and social system, to all intents and purposes.
					 Rodong Sinmun Friday says this in a bylined article.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The above-mentioned "resolutions" are the height of such hostile action to ignite a nuclear war against the DPRK.
					
					 It is the scenario of the U.S. to put the whole of Korea under its control and land on Eurasia in order to establish a military control over it and realize the ambition for dominating the whole world.
					
					 The U.S. seeks to put the Korean Peninsula under its military domination in a bid to contain and overpower big powers in this region and establish a hegemonic position in the Asia-Pacific region. 
					
					 Precisely for this reason the U.S. diverted the pivot of its foreign policy to Asia-Pacific in recent years. The rebalancing of its forces in the region is being pushed forward at its final phase.
					
					 The U.S. is hurling not only the south Korean puppet forces but even troops of its satellite states into the on-going Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint war maneuvers in a desperate effort to ignite a nuclear war against the DPRK.
					
					 It is the firm stand of the DPRK to take stronger countermeasures in succession and lead them to a great war for national reunification in case the U.S. chooses a conflict in the end.
					
					 The U.S. had better ponder over the catastrophic consequences to be entailed by its reckless hostile policy towards the DPRK and stop its rash acts.
					
					 The U.S. seems not to know what a real war is like. The confrontation with the DPRK would offer the U.S. an opportunity to experience the war. Then it would be too late for the U.S. to regret.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Holds Hostile Forces Accountable for Grave Situation
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Holds Hostile Forces Accountable for Grave Situation 
 Pyongyang, March 15 (KCNA) -- The forces hostile to the DPRK are to blame for the touch-and-go situation prevailing on the Korean Peninsula, says Rodong Sinmun Friday in a bylined article. 
					 Since the demise of the Cold War the U.S. has resorted to arbitrary practices and interference and undisguised moves for aggression in different parts of the world under the signboard of "establishment of a new global order", styling itself "the only superpower in the world", the article says, and goes on:
					
					 Due to the U.S. high-handed acts, the situation has gone to such pass where not a few countries have followed its policy of establishing the American style order and even some countries styling themselves big powers hesitate to say what they wish to utter and do as dictated by the U.S. 
					
					 The U.S. has become so arrogant that it put the UN Security Council under its control and turned it into a rubber-stamp for justifying the international moves to stifle the DPRK. 
					
					 Under the pressure of the U.S. high-handed practices, the UNSC took in recent years a series of provocative measures justifying and legalizing the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK which call for groundless criticism, "sanctions" and pressure upon it. 
					
					 Pursuant to "the resolution on sanctions," the U.S. and the south Korean puppet regime are working hard to deliberately strain the situation on the Korean Peninsula and push it to the brink of a nuclear war against the DPRK. 
					
					 However, the U.S. imperialists and south Korean warmongers are seriously mistaken. 
					
					 If the enemies infringe upon the sovereignty of the DPRK even a bit under the signboard of "sanctions", this will mark a historic moment for the army and people of the DPRK to give full play to their will to settle accounts with the U.S. and for the invincible war deterrence to go into action.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Blasts Rigmaroles of Former S. Korean Unification Minister
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Blasts Rigmaroles of Former S. Korean Unification Minister
 Pyongyang, March 15 (KCNA) -- Ryu U Ik in his "address" made leaving the office as minister of Unification on March 11 talked the nonsense that the Lee Myung Bak regime sought to take the "road of developing south-north relations and pursuing co-existence and co-prosperity but the north opted for a nuclear test." He also jabbered that "the longer the north takes a wrong path, the greater difficulties and peril it will face."
					 He, at the same time, cried out for "substantial preparations for unification", urging the north not to forget "human rights".
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Friday in a bylined commentary terms his jargons sophism which can be let loose only by Ryu, the worst confrontation maniac.
					
					 The commentary goes on:
					
					 The present worst catastrophic phase of the inter-Korean relations is attributable to the crimes traitor Ryu has committed for the last 17 months of his office by zealously working to implement the confrontation policy of traitor Lee.
					
					 The above-said reckless remarks made by Ryu are aimed to prod the new regime into the same "human rights" racket against the DPRK and the farce called "jar of unification" as the Lee regime did, in a bid to lead them to "the unification of social systems."
					
					 His retirement will never help write off the hideous crimes he committed against reunification.
					
					 The Korean nation will certainly bring Lee Myung Bak and Ryu U Ik to the court of history so that they may face a stern punishment.

articles.title: KCNA Blasts US and Its Allies' Cyber Attacks
articles.content:
KCNA Blasts US and Its Allies' Cyber Attacks
 Pyongyang, March 15 (KCNA) -- There are very disturbing developments against the backdrop of the ever mounting moves of the U.S. and its allies to stifle the DPRK.
					 Intensive and persistent virus attacks are being made every day on internet servers operated by the DPRK. These cannot be construed otherwise than despicable and base acts of the hostile forces consternated by the toughest measures taken by the DPRK after launching an all-out action.
					
					 What should not be overlooked is that such cyber attack is timed to coincide with the madcap Key Resolve joint military exercises being staged by the U.S. and other hostile forces.
					
					 It is nobody's secret that the U.S. and south Korean puppet regime are massively bolstering up cyber forces in a bid to intensify the subversive activities and sabotages against the DPRK.
					
					 The DPRK will never remain a passive onlooker to the enemies' cyber attacks that have reached a very grave phase as part of their moves to stifle it.
					
					 It is ridiculous, indeed, for the hostile forces to mount such virus attacks on the DPRK's internet servers, much upset by the all-out action of its army and people to defend the sovereignty of the country and the nation.
					
					 They are seriously mistaken if they think they can quell the DPRK's voices of justice through such base acts.
					
					 The U.S. and its allies should be held wholly accountable for the ensuing consequences.

articles.title: Bellicose Forces' Policy of Confrontation with DPRK Slammed
articles.content:
Bellicose Forces' Policy of Confrontation with DPRK Slammed
 Pyongyang, March 15 (KCNA) -- The South Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration held a press conference in Seoul on March 11, calling for defusing the danger of war and ensuring peace on the Korean Peninsula. An emergency appeal was issued at the conference.
					 The appeal said that the situation on the peninsula is inching close to a war crisis again.
					
					 The prevailing situation is attributable to the U.S. and the south Korean authorities' policy of confrontation with the DPRK, it noted, adding:
					
					 There has been no discussion for concluding a peace treaty because of this policy of rejecting dialogue and negotiations and insisting on tightening "sanctions".
					
					 People should not remain a passive onlooker to the reckless acts of putting their life at stake.

articles.title: Paving Way for Peace Called for in S. Korea
articles.content:
Paving Way for Peace Called for in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, March 15 (KCNA) -- O Jong Ryol, permanent adviser to the Solidarity for Progress in south Korea, was interviewed by People's Voice, an internet broadcasting service, on March 11 in view of the situation on the Korean Peninsula which is inching close to the brink of a war.
					 He said that the Key Resolve joint military exercises are little short of Team Spirit as they are now under way under the changed codename.
					
					 Voices are mounting higher among south Koreans from all walks of life demanding a stop to the war drills against the north and peace, he noted, adding that to brand them as "the forces following the north" is little different from acts of inciting a war and perpetuating the division.
					
					 He expressed concern over the tragedy and disasters to be entailed by a war on the Korean Peninsula hardly comparable with those during the June 25 war.
					
					 The forces standing in the way of peace are the hardliners of south Korea and the U.S., he said, urging the separatists and Cold War-minded forces to come to their senses.
					
					 He called on the progressive forces to join hands and pool wisdom to pave the way for peace.

articles.title: US-S. Korea Military Drills Hit by Koreans' Organization in US
articles.content:
US-S. Korea Military Drills Hit by Koreans' Organization in US
 Pyongyang, March 15 (KCNA) -- The Federation of Koreans in the U.S. released a statement on March 8 in protest against the north-targeted war drills of the U.S. and south Korean warmongers.
					 The on-going saber-rattling in south Korea is, in actuality, nuclear war drills aimed to invade the north with U.S. forces in its mainland, Japan and Hawaii and various types of latest nuclear war hardware involved, the statement said, adding:
					
					 To cope with this, the north totally nullified the Korean Armistice Agreement and the north-south non-aggression pacts, declaring an all-out action against the U.S.
					
					 The U.S. is keen to conduct "war diplomacy" against the north by staging joint war drills against it, not seeking a peaceful settlement of the issue with the north.  This is an irretrievable mistake.
					
					 Koreans can never forget the past war tragedy, the statement noted, demanding the U.S. wake up from its wild dream and seek a solution in normalizing the DPRK-U.S. relations through dialogue.  
					
					 The south Korean regime should immediately cease the north-targeted joint war drills, keenly aware that such war moves against compatriots are acts of treachery, the statement held.

articles.title: US-S. Korea Military Drills under Fire by Koreans in Germany
articles.content:
Scientific, Technological Festival of Kim Il Sung University Held
 Pyongyang, March 15 (KCNA) -- The European Regional Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification and the Society for Cooperation among Koreans in Germany on March 11 made public a statement condemning the U.S-south Korea war exercises against the north.
					 The statement said:
					
					 For the past six decades the U.S. has staged war drills with huge military forces involved including latest war hardware under the signboard of "annual war exercises for defence" in violation of the Armistice Agreement. The south Korean puppet army, which has no right to military operations, was forced to bear the brunt of the drills which involved troops of other satellite countries of the U.S. 
					
					 The arrogance and arbitrariness of the U.S. reached their height and the universally accepted rights guaranteed by international law are trampled down.
					
					 The DPRK conducted the third underground nuclear test in protest against the unreasonable "resolution on sanctions" which the UN Security Council fabricated, labeling the country's legitimate satellite launch a "long-range missile launch."
					
					 It emerged a satellite launcher and nuclear weapons state by its own efforts, keeping in mind the truth that it is possible to live without sugar, but not without bullets in order to stand up against the U.S. moves to isolate and stifle it, blockade and sanctions.
					
					 It is waiting for the time to fight a final battle, ready to prove by dint of powerful war deterrent that it is not an empty talk to blow up the mainland of the U.S., the stronghold of aggression.
					
					 The world expects justice to win and injustice to suffer a defeat on the Korean Peninsula.

articles.title: Provocative War Drills against DPRK Condemned
articles.content:
Provocative War Drills against DPRK Condemned
 Pyongyang, March 15 (KCNA) -- 53 peace campaign organizations of over 20 different countries and 530 international peace activists and personages issued an urgent joint statement on March 4 demanding the U.S. and the south Korean warmongers stop the DPRK-targeted war drills.
					 The U.S.-south Korea joint military drills including Key Resolve, Foal Eagle and Ulji Freedom Guardian being staged every year serve as a main factor of escalating the tension on the Korean Peninsula, the statement noted.
					
					 It demanded the U.S. and the south Korean authorities stop at once the provocative war drills against the DPRK and take a positive step to defuse the tension on the peninsula.

articles.title: Romanian Political Party Raps US-S. Korea Military Drills
articles.content:
Romanian Political Party Raps US-S. Korea Military Drills
 Pyongyang, March 15 (KCNA) -- With no threat and blackmail can the U.S. and south Korea break the strong will of the Korean people led by the great brilliant commander.
					 The Socialist Party of Romania said this in its statement on Mar. 6 in denunciation of the Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises kicked off by the U.S. and the south Korean regime.
					
					 They have mobilized huge forces and arms including nuclear weapons for the frantic military drills, being deeply engaged in the dangerous acts of war on the Korean Peninsula, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 This is nothing but acts of aggression against the DPRK from A to Z and the greatest nuclear threat.
					
					 It is none other than the U.S. which destroys peace and wantonly violates the Korean Armistice Agreement on the Peninsula.
					
					 Quite just is the statement issued by a spokesman for the Supreme Command of the Korean People's Army which declared the stronger measures of counteractions to cope with the ceaseless moves of the U.S. and hostile forces to stifle the DPRK and their nuclear threat.
					
					 We strongly urge the U.S. and the south Korean regime to immediately stop their war maneuvers which stoke the danger of a imminent nuclear war on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 Final victory is in store for the Korean people.

articles.title: DPRK's Measures Supported by Organizations of Ecuador
articles.content:
DPRK's Measures Supported by Organizations of Ecuador
 Pyongyang, March 15 (KCNA) -- The Ecuadorian Committee for Supporting Korea's Independent and Peaceful Reunification, the Ecuadorian Cultural Institute for the Study of the Juche Idea, the Canar Provincial Institute for the Friendship and Solidarity with DPRK of Ecuador and the Ecuador-Guaranda Institute for Friendship and Cultural Solidarity with the Korean People issued a joint statement on March 7 in support of the statement of a spokesman for the Supreme Command of the Korean People's Army and the statement of a spokesman for the DPRK Foreign Ministry.
					 We resolutely denounce the Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises kicked off by the U.S. and its allies as the most outrageous and undisguised military provocation and moves for aggression against the Korean people, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 The Korean people are the heroic people strongest in independence who never pardon any enemy for violating their dignity.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK, rallied close around Marshal Kim Jong Un, the outstanding brilliant Songun commander, will resolutely shatter the moves of the U.S. imperialists for aggression with powerful nuclear strike means.
					
					 We fully support important measures and the toughest stand declared to the world by the KPA Supreme Command and the DPRK Foreign Ministry in the statements of their spokesmen, considering them just ones to defend the sovereignty and supreme interests of the country.
					
					 We express once again firm solidarity for the Korean people in their just struggle to root out the source of a war from the Korean Peninsula, reunify the country and realize global independence.

articles.title: US-S. Korea Military Drills Slammed by Political Party of Peru
articles.content:
US-S. Korea Military Drills Slammed by Political Party of Peru
 Pyongyang, March 15 (KCNA) -- The Peruvian National Independent Movement for Free Voting's Union and the General Kim Jong Il Peruvian Amicable Institute released a joint statement on March 6 to denounce the U.S. imperialists and south Korean puppet regime for their reckless moves to ignite a new war.
					 The statement said:
					
					 The DPRK has the right to have access to nuclear weapons to defend global peace and safeguard its people.
					
					 No country of the world is entitled to apply sanctions and put pressure on the DPRK over its satellite launch for peaceful purposes.
					
					 We denounce the U.S. and south Korean authorities for their moves for aggression including the Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises.
					
					 The DPRK has bolstered up its military muscle in every way by dint of the Songun politics to ensure the peace on the Korean Peninsula and deter any aggressor forces from encroaching upon its territory.
					
					 We are strongly opposed to the U.S. imperialists and their stooges' constant moves for a war against the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. and the south Korean puppet regime should stop at once their moves for a war against the DPRK.
					
					 We call upon the world peace-loving people to denounce the U.S. and its allies for their moves to invade the DPRK.

articles.title: Halt to US-S. Korea Military Drills Demanded by Organizations of Nigeria
articles.content:
Halt to US-S. Korea Military Drills Demanded by Organizations of Nigeria
 Pyongyang, March 15 (KCNA) -- Organizations of Nigeria and Democratic Congo issued statements on March 7 to denounce the U.S. and south Korean warmongers for their joint military exercises.
					 The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea said:
					
					 We condemn the U.S.-south Korea Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises as a grave provocation to socialist Korea of Juche and an unpardonable criminal act of pushing the situation on the Korean Peninsula to the brink of a war. 
					
					 It is very just that the Supreme Command of the Korean People's Army took important measures to cope with the moves of the U.S. to ignite a war of aggression.
					
					 The committee is convinced that the Korean people will achieve a final victory in an all-out action against the enemies under the outstanding leadership of the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The Association of Democratic Congo for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism noted:
					
					 The saber-rattling is a dangerous act of bringing the dark clouds of a nuclear war to hang over the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 The U.S. and its allies should stop at once the saber-rattling aimed to wreck peace and security on the peninsula.
					
					 The U.S. should roll back its anachronistic hostile policy toward the DPRK and withdraw its troops from south Korea so that all the Koreans can reunify the country independently and peacefully.
					
					 The south Korean authorities should stop all acts of escalating confrontation with fellow countrymen and the tension on the peninsula and opt for achieving the reunification of the country.

articles.title: New Homepage Praises Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
New Homepage Praises Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, March 15 (KCNA) -- The Brazilian Committee for Remembering Leader Kim Jong Il opened its Internet homepage on Mar. 5.
					 Seen on the homepage are photos of Kimjongilia and Jong Il Peak as well as a portrait of smiling Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The brief biography of Kim Jong Il and the statement issued by a spokesman for the Supreme Command of the Korean People's Army were posted on the homepage.

articles.title: Day of Sun to Be Celebrated in Syria
articles.content:
Day of Sun to Be Celebrated in Syria
 Pyongyang, March 15 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee of the Socialist Unionist Party of Syria was inaugurated on Mar. 6 to mark the Day of the Sun, the birthday of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Its Deputy General Secretary Adnan Ismail was elected chairman of the committee.
					
					 The committee decided to organize diverse political and cultural events on the Day of the Sun, the most auspicious holiday common to mankind.

articles.title: Anniversary of Law on Agrarian in DPRK Observed by Nigerian Organization
articles.content:
Anniversary of Law on Agrarian in DPRK Observed by Nigerian Organization
 Pyongyang, March 15 (KCNA) -- The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea posted on its website an article entitled " Law on the Agrarian Reform that realized the centuries-old desire of the peasants" on Mar. 6.
					 The article said:
					
					 Mar. 5 this year marks the 67th anniversary of the promulgation of the historic Law on the Agrarian Reform in the DPRK.
					
					 This event would be unthinkable without the feats President Kim Il Sung performed by putting a definite end to the feudal land ownership and exploiting system in Korea and realizing the Korean peasants' centuries-old desire to be owners of land.
					
					 He worked heart and soul to realize the peasants' desire to become owners of land from the very day he embarked upon the road of revolution.
					
					 Based on his rich experience gained in the period of the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle, he singled out the agrarian reform as the primary task for carrying out all democratic reforms right after the country's liberation and wisely led the efforts for effecting the reform.
					
					 He set forth the original policy for the successful enforcement of the agrarian reform including the issues of carrying out the agrarian reform on the principle of confiscating land without compensation and making free land distribution and properly defining the land to be confiscated and targets of struggle under the motto "Land to the tillers!"
					
					 He promulgated the Law on the Enforcement of the Agrarian Reform on Mar. 5, 1946.
					
					 The Korean people will eternally  glorify the  revolutionary feats he performed by providing an eternal foundation for building a rich and powerful sovereign and independent country by bringing about a great social change in the struggle for the settlement of the rural issue in the early period of the building of new Korea.

articles.title: Rally for Solidarity with Koreans Held in Benin
articles.content:
Rally for Solidarity with Koreans Held in Benin
 Pyongyang, March 15 (KCNA) -- There took place a solidarity rally in Benin on Mar. 7 in support of the statement of the spokesman for the Supreme Command of the Korean People's Army.
					 The statement was read out at the rally.
					
					 Then followed speeches.
					
					 Hessou Kohovi, chairman of the Benin-Korea Amicable Association "Long Live Kim Jong Il, Supreme Leader" and chairman of the Benin National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, said: 
					
					 It is the unshakable stand and the mode of counteraction of the army and people of the DPRK to counter enemies coming in attack with a dagger with a sword, a rifle with an artillery piece and nukes with precision nuclear strike means of Korean style more powerful than them.
					
					 Pascal Zouncheme, chief of the Benin Group for the Study of Kimilsungism and Kimjongilism and rector of the Cotonou Institute of Journalism of Benin, denounced Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises by the U.S. and its allies as dangerous criminal acts that endanger the peace on the Korean Peninsula and in Northeast Asia and, furthermore, in the rest of the world.
					
					 The hostile forces are behaving recklessly against the DPRK over its legitimate satellite launch and underground nuclear test for self-defence, he said.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK, single-mindedly united around the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un, will not miss the golden chance but win a victory in the confrontation with the U.S. and a great war for national reunification, he concluded.
					
					 At the end of the meeting they watched Korean film "Reply of the DPRK".

articles.title: Provocadores de guerra no podran evitar fuego de represalia, advierte CRPP
articles.content:
Provocadores de guerra no podran evitar fuego de represalia, advierte CRPP
Pyongyang, 15 de marzo (ACNC) -- El Secretariado del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria (CRPP) publico el dia 14 la informacion no.1022 que sigue:
					Debido a los freneticos ejercicios militares conjuntos "Key Resolve" de Estados Unidos y los belicistas surcoreanos, va de mal en peor la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					Al respecto, la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea ya ha declarado que a partir del 11 de marzo en que los ejercicios de guerra nuclear anti-RPDC entran en la fase crucial, anulara el Acuerdo de Armisticio de Corea y todos los acuerdos de no agresion aprobados entre el Norte y el Sur de Corea y tomara sucesivamente contramedidas mas fuertes.
					
					De acuerdo con esa declaracion, el ejercito y el pueblo de Corea ocupan ahora la posicion de ataque final por la reunificacion de la patria mientras todos los medios de ataque de precision, inclusive los nucleares, esperan la orden de fuego apuntando sus blancos.
					
					Las importantes medidas anunciadas por la RPDC son justas contramedidas y ultimatum frente a las acciones hostiles y las aventuras de guerra anti-RPDC de EE.UU. y los titeres surcoreanos.
					
					Sin embargo, esos ultimos se muestran desafiantes diciendo que las medidas de la RPDC "agravan la tension" y "se enfrentaran rotundamente al intento de romper los acuerdos".
					
					Las autoridades titeres surcoreanas y los plumiferos pagados censuran en estos dias las medidas importantes de la RPDC aduciendo que "ambas partes deben acordarlas" y "ellas deben obtener el reconocimiento internacional".
					
					Ademas, insisten en que las maniobras militares anti-RPDC son "las de defensa que se libran anualmente en el marco del Acuerdo de Armisticio".
					
					Como reconoce todo el mundo, el Acuerdo de Armisticio y los de no agresion N-S han sido cancelados y hechos letras muertas ya hace mucho tiempo.
					
					Desde el momento de aprobacion y entrada en vigor de esos documentos, EE.UU. y la banda titere surcoreana vinieron violandolos y rompiendolos sistematicamente.
					
					Debido a la campana de aplastamiento y provocacion incesante anti-RPDC, sin precedentes en la historia, persiste la situacion incontrolable en que resultaron letras muertas todos los aparatos legales para frenar el choque armado en esta tierra.
					
					En particular, la flotilla de portaaviones nuclear y los bombarderos estrategicos nucleares, listos para atacar a la RPDC, libran a lo largo del ano en el cielo y el mar del Sur de Corea y su contorno los ejercicios de guerra de agresion a la RPDC.
					
					Por lo tanto, la Peninsula Coreana se ha convertido en la zona mas candente del mundo y arsenal nuclear peligroso donde cualquier chispazo puede expandirse a la guerra nuclear.
					
					Los provocadores, que se acometen con el garrote de agresion, hablan cinicamente ahora de la existencia continua del Acuerdo de Armisticio y el de no agresion.
					
					Ahora, la banda surcoreana describe la decision rotunda de la RPDC como "chantaje" y "campana psicologica".
					
					Los agresores y los provocadores deben ver bien la situacion actual.
					
					Seria absurdo que ellos confundan la grave situacion de hoy con el enfrentamiento verbal del pasado.
					
					Ellos no podran evitar el fuego de represalia que les caera en cualquier momento.
					
					Todo el ejercito y el pueblo de Corea, como han declarado, devastaran todos los bastiones y bases de agresores y provocadores.
					
					No podran estar fuera del alcance de nuestro ataque de justicia los que vulneran la paz y desatan la guerra persiguiendo el enfrentamiento fratricida.
					
					La banda surcoreana debe actuar con prudencia.

articles.title: CRPP condena repeticion de "teoria de fuerzas pro-Norte" en Sur de Corea
articles.content:
CRPP condena repeticion de "teoria de fuerzas pro-Norte" en Sur de Corea
Pyongyang, 15 de marzo (ACNC) -- El Secretariado del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria (CRPP) hizo publica hoy la informacion no.1023 que sigue:
					Ahora, se alzan en suelo surcoreano las voces que condenan la "sancion" anti-Republica Popular Democratica de Corea impuesta por la ONU y demandan parar ahora mismo los ejercicios de guerra Estados Unidos-Sur de Corea para la agresion al Norte de Corea.
					
					"Es imposible dar solucion a la situacion mediante la sancion" y la "presente maniobra militar es la de ataque con clara meta de eliminar el regimen norcoreano", asi opinan las entidades civiles y sociales progresistas, incluyendo la Solidaridad por el Progreso y la Federacion de Estudiantes Universitarios en el Siglo XXI, las personalidades de partidos opositores y circulos academico y religioso y los habitantes de otros sectores del Sur de Corea.
					
					Igualmente, exigen fuertemente a EE.UU. y la banda traidora surcoreana tomar el camino de dialogo y firma del acuerdo de paz tras suspender la peligrosa campana de "sancion", enfrentamiento y guerra contra la RPDC.
					
					Advierten que desplegarian el movimiento antiyanqui junto con las entidades del movimiento por la paz en el caso de que el imperio continue el entrenamiento militar sin proceder a la firma del acuerdo de paz.
					
					Como integrantes de la nacion coreana, ellos no se quedan en la inaccion ante la situacion actual con rumbo a la peor coyuntura y formulan esa demanda justa recogiendo la aspiracion y voluntad de los compatriotas que desean frenar la guerra en la Peninsula Coreana mediante la distension y la paz.
					
					Sin embargo, la camarilla titere surcoreana, incluyendo el "Partido Saenuri", y los medios conservadores del Sur de Corea califican a ellos como "fuerzas pro-Norte" diciendo que "amparan al Norte" y "revelan abiertamente su naturaleza de fuerzas pro-Norte", lo cual constituye otro imperdonable crimen antinacional y locura conflictiva con la RPDC.
					
					De esa manera, los traidores surcoreanos quieren alcanzar su siniestro objetivo de distraer la mirada critica de la poblacion indignada, justificar su campana de enfrentamiento y guerra y aprovechar la situacion creada para eliminar a toda costa las fuerzas del movimiento por la reunificacion en alianza con el Norte y por la paz antibelica.
					
					Encolerizados por la acusacion en su contra, las entidades progresistas y diversos estratos surcoreanos la rechazan fuertemente contradiciendo que "si rechazar la guerra y reclamar la paz representan la posicion del Norte, desear la guerra es entonces representar la postura de EE.UU.".
					
					El replanteamiento de la ya desbaratada "teoria de fuerzas pro-Norte" deja conocer que los titeres surcoreanos se hallan en aprieto presionados por las criticas internas y externas.
					
					El presente incidente pone al desnudo la asquerosa fachada de ellos como vendepatrias proyanquis encargados de cumplir la guerra que pretende el imperialismo norteamericano.
					
					El "Partido Saenuri" y la banda conservadora surcoreana han de parar su imprudente maniobra militar y sucia campana contra las llamadas "fuerzas pro-Norte" conociendo bien la gravedad de la situacion y la opinion publica.
					
					En el caso contrario, afrontaran las protestas y condenas mas fuertes de nacionales y extranjeros y seran condenados a la derrota mas vergonzosa y muerte tragica.
					
					Los habitantes de diferentes sectores surcoreanos deben movilizarse en la lucha contra la febril campana de confrontacion fratricida y guerra de la horda conservadora proyanqui.

articles.title: AJDC insiste en sentenciar a traidor Lee Myung Bak
articles.content:
AJDC insiste en sentenciar a traidor Lee Myung Bak
Pyongyang, 15 de marzo (ACNC) -- El portavoz de la Asociacion de Juristas Democraticos de Corea hizo publica el dia 15 una declaracion como sigue:
					Hoy dia, en el Sur de Corea se libra una lucha por sentenciar legalmente al traidor Lee Myung Bak quien durante su mandato cometio incontables crimenes.
					
					Hace poco, el sindicato de "YTN" apelo a la fiscalia a Lee en demanda de sentenciarle por el crimen de la inspeccion ilegal a los civiles, en tanto, la Solidaridad Civil por la Sociedad Democratica y DDHH acuso al traidor y su familia bajo la sospecha de la compra de solar para vivienda en Naegokdong.
					
					La campana librada furiosa e inmediatamente despues de la retirada de Lee del poder a fin de sentenciar a Lee por sus corrupciones y crimenes, es una explosion de las indignaciones acumuladas de los habitantes surcoreanos y una justa lucha por corregir la justicia social.
					
					Al recordar la trayectoria de su mandato de 5 anos, Lee se entrego solo a la injusticia y actos males.
					
					El caso de "manipulacion de valor de acciones de BBK", el de fondo ilegal para las "elecciones presidenciales", el del Banco de Ahorro, el de manipulacion de valor de acciones de CNK, el de inspeccion ilegal a los civiles, la compra de solar para la vivienda en Naegokdong y otras corrupciones, fraudes y estafas de Lee, su familia y sus colaboradores consternan a todo el mundo.
					
					Debido a acciones criminales del traidor, que gano la mala fama como "estafador", "personificacion de descarado", "presidente  corrupto", y sus familiares, el suelo  surcoreano se convirtio en una sociedad corrupta e infierno humano.
					
					Son innumerables los crimenes de Lee que se aferro a las maniobras conflictivas y de guerra.
					
					Con sus actos traidores y serviles a grandes potencias, Lee perjudico la dignidad y el interes de la nacion, congelo las relaciones entre ambas partes coreanas y puso gran obstaculos en el camino de la paz y la reunificacion.
					
					Como resultado, Lee fue calificado de un traidor nunca visto que supera a los "5 Traidores de Ulsa" y de un infame maniaco conflictivo.
					
					Lee, delincuente de especial grado, no podra evitar la sentencia categorica de los habitantes surcoreanos y todos los connacionales muy indignados, al igual que los anteriores lacayos proyanquis.
					
					Es obvio que se echara a carcel tan pronto se retire de su cargo como Chun Doo Hwan y Roh Thae Woo.
					
					No hay prescripcion en la sentencia legal al traidor que perpetro ante la historia y la nacion los crimenes antipopular, anti-reunificacion y antietico.
					
					Todos los surcoreanos deben explotar sus indignaciones acumuladas durante 5 anos para sentenciar legalmente a Lee y su familia.

articles.title: ACNC rechaza ataque cibernetico anti-RPDC
articles.content:
ACNC rechaza ataque cibernetico anti-RPDC
Pyongyang, 15 de marzo (ACNC) -- En estos tiempos en que se tornan mas siniestras las acciones de Estados Unidos y sus seguidores para atropellar a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, se reportan casos sospechosos como ciberataque diario e intensivo contra los servidores de Internet de la RPDC.
					Lo calificamos de acto sucio de las fuerzas hostiles asustadas por las medidas intransigentes de la RPDC que entro en el enfrentamiento total por defender su soberania.
					
					Lo insoslayable del caso es que el ataque cibernetico coincide con los ejercicios militares conjuntos "Key Resolve", iniciados por EE.UU. y otras fuerzas hostiles.
					
					No es secreto que EE.UU. y los titeres surcoreanos aumentan en gran medida las fuerzas ciberneticas como parte de su campana de subversion y sabotaje anti-RPDC.
					
					Serian muy equivocadas si esas fuerzas hostiles piensan en que con tales actos de gallina, podran tapar la voz justa de la RPDC. 
					
					EE.UU. y sus satelites deberan responsabilizarse de todas las consecuencias que emanen de eso.
